channel.title: Declarative setup
channel.description:
Hello,
we have multiple Redash on multiple K8s cluster per environments, is there a way to keep all them in sync for groups management and eventually datasources ? The API don't provide any enpoint, maybe is there any file or storage data I can create to spin up a redash already configured?
Thanks, Mauro
